channel.title: Top server making tools and tips you need to stay ahead [317]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Note: I do not own or operate any of these tools listed.[/size]
[size=12pt]Most server owners think there alot smarter then the basic hacker but they keep getting smarter and smarter so you have to. Here a few tips and tricks that will help protect your server.[/size]
[size=14pt] [BASIC] Quickly port forwarding client [/size]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/qp4ids.jpg[/img] [size=12pt]This is a basic program that allows you to change your rsps connection port without having to go into the internet and send out information. This is for speed and staying safe, most people say that theres no need to worry about being hacked threw your port forwarding online but its the internet, anything can happen.
Link To Download:[url=http://simpleportforwarding.com/download]http://simpleportforwarding.com/download[/url][/size]
[size=14pt] [BASIC]Port forwarding with utorrent[/size]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/24mzyww.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Port forwarding with utorrent is another way to port forward but this tool can also be uses for other things like cheeking the speed of your computer and downloading other files online. Link To Download:[url=http://www.utorrent.com]www.utorrent.com[/url] [/size]
[size=14pt] [Easy] Simple protection[/size]
[size=12pt]The most simple way to keep your files safe is to delete all the .java files and the compiler in your client before you send it out for others to use. This way you can keep the size of the client down so people have less time before they get it from a download and its harder for people to get and use the client for there sorce. Just make sure you keep a back up of the client just for you so you can still edit it.[/size]
[size=14pt] [Easy] .Bat to .Exe maker[/size]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/qofsyg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ahtsu8.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]This is mostly to make your server look more professional. This takes your weird looking .bat files like your run.bat file and turns it into a non editable simple version of it. This also keeps people from messing stuff up.
Link To Download: [url=http://www.softsia.com/ExeScript-Bat-To-Exe-download-fcby.htm]http://www.softsia.com/ExeScript-Bat-To-Exe-download-fcby.htm[/url][/size]
[size=14pt] [Easy] Hiding files[/size]
[size=12pt]Before you do this make sure that you made it so you can see hidden files by going into your client folders and clicking tools and opening up the folder options. From there go to view and select show hidden files.[/size]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/xga4hx.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2el8sn6.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]After doing that now you can hide all the files so it looks more clean and provides a basic defense agents client stealing. To do this select all the files in your client except the Run.exe or what ever you named it and then right click and go to properties and click to apply the files as hidden. Many people will say this is very simple and it is but it still needs to be done cause some defense is better then no defense. [/size] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2yyyptl.jpg[/img]

item.title: Top server making tools and tips you need to stay ahead [317]
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

x andrew x:

Hiding files is a basic thing for begginers, I only put this in here to help new people.

So just because they are new you tell them to do something completely retarded?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

Dont even bother hiding the files. If you cant at least jar your client you have nothing worth leeching. And yes i agree utorrent is > portforwarding if operating from a home computer.

Read full topic
